title: Learn the Fundamentals of Microsoft Project 2016
headline: Learn how to operate MS Project Professional 2016 to plan, monitor, & control a project in this free online course.
description: Did you know that, although 'Microsoft Project' was first released in the 1980s, and still is a significant player in the industry today? This course will familiarise you with the basic features and functions of Microsoft Project Professional 2016, so you can use the software successfully and efficiently in your real-world situation. Also, learn about the skills and expertise that a project manager requires to construct successful a project plan.
courseDescription:
MS Project is one of the most widely used PC-based project management software programs, providing project managers with a wide range of capabilities. This course will guide you through a variety of tools in the program. We'll also show you methods for optimal programming of tasks, resources, and costs associated with a project's development. All of this will help you become more efficient in controlling the impact of constraints during project challenges. You will learn to develop a project plan with Project 2016 and share it for review and approval with your supervisor and other stakeholders. The curriculum is divided into two segments, ensuring complete synergy between organization and optimization. We will start with the fundamental concepts, followed by task scheduling, and conclude with key resource assignment techniques to enhance a project's overall performance.

This course will help you to improve your monitoring and controlling abilities as a project manager. You will understand the importance of correctly organizing tasks, costs, and resources to monitor changes while implementing the project plan. Next, you will learn to improve your scheduling skills to align assets with your project's task appropriately. The Workflow Baseline Structure (WBS) assignment and comprehension to measure project performance are among them. Lastly, we will demonstrate various optimization approaches and methodologies like the critical path to motivate you to utilize your administrative skills. The foundation for designing a successful project is learning the fundamentals of project management software. After all, it is a lot less complicated than you may assume. This course will equip you with the primary knowledge to understand the tool environment. You will also develop your controlling and monitoring skills and learn how to do proper planning for each project you work on.

Finally, the educational journey will improve your monitoring and controlling abilities as a project manager. You will understand the importance of organizing tasks, costs, and resources correctly to monitor changes while implementing the project plan. Following that, you will learn how to improve your scheduling skills so that you can appropriately align assets with their project's task. The assignment and comprehension of the Workflow Baseline Structure (WBS) to measure project performance are among them. Lastly, you will explore various optimization approaches and methodologies like the critical path to motivate you to utilize your administrative skills. The foundation for designing a successful project is learning the fundamentals of project management software. After all, it is a lot less difficult than you may assume. 'Learn the Foundations of Microsoft Project 2016' is an informative course that teaches about the MSP software application with the primary knowledge to understand the tool environment, develop your controlling and monitoring skills, and achieve proper planning for each work of the project plan.
